EDIT_MODE.DELETE: Long press to remove from current set
EDIT_MODE.HINT_POINT_WINDOW:
Point at a window to change its parameters.
Once done, leave edit mode using the button on the right.
EDIT_MODE.POS_ANCHORED: Anchored: Moves together with the rest of the set. Default.
EDIT_MODE.POS_FLOATING: Floating: Stay in place, recenter when shown.
EDIT_MODE.POS_STATIC: Static: Stay in place and never recenter.

MOUSE.TITLE: Mouse fixes
MOUSE.WRONG_SCREEN_SELECTION_HELP:
If the cursor moves on a completely different screen,
the screens were likely selected wrong. See readme.

GRAB.GRABBING_WATCH: To swap hands, move the watch in front and grab it with the other hand.
GRAB.GRABBING_STATIC: This overlay is Static and will stay in place, ignoring recenter.
GRAB.GRABBING_ANCHORED: Anchored overlays all move together. Separate a single window by grabbing it with the other hand while still grabbing the anchor.
GRAB.GRABBING_ANCHORED_EDIT: This overlay will stay anchored to the center marker.
GRAB.GRABBING_FLOATING: This overlay is Floating and will stay in place, unless recentered.
GRAB.GRABBING_FOLLOW: This overlay will follow the device it is attached to.
